message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I'll give you a small amount, but I think I deserve more.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. But I'm not giving away too much!
I'm not getting much, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than last time.
I'm starting to get a bit greedy, Bob. This is my best offer so far!
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm taking most of the money this time.
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob. This is my last good offer!
I'm taking it all, Alice. You should have accepted my previous offer.
I'm not going to let you take everything, Bob. This is my final offer!
